channel.title: Docker guides on Docker Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Docker guides on Docker Docs

item.title: Develop and test AWS Cloud applications using LocalStack and Docker
item.description: This guide explains how to use Docker to run LocalStack, a local AWS cloud stack emulator.

item.title: Building Compose projects with Bake
item.description: This guide demonstrates how you can use Bake to build production-grade images for Docker Compose projects.

item.title: Faster development and testing with container-supported development
item.description: Containers don't have to be just for your app. Learn how to run your app's dependent services and other debugging tools to enhance your development environment.

item.title: Data science with JupyterLab
item.description: Use Docker to run Jupyter notebooks.

item.title: Deploy to Kubernetes
item.description: Learn how to deploy and orchestrate Docker containers using Kubernetes.

item.title: Deploy to Swarm
item.description: Discover how to deploy and manage Docker containers using Docker Swarm.

item.title: Deployment and orchestration
item.description: Explore the essentials of container orchestration with Docker.

item.title: Developing event-driven applications with Kafka and Docker
item.description: This guide explains how to run Apache Kafka in Docker containers.

item.title: Face detection with TensorFlow.js
item.description: This guide explains how to run TensorFlow.js in Docker containers.

item.title: Introduction to GitHub Actions with Docker
item.description: Learn how to automate image build and push with GitHub Actions.

item.title: HTTP routing with Traefik
item.description: Use Traefik to easily route traffic between multiple containers or non-containerized workloads

item.title: Build a language translation app
item.description: This guide demonstrates how to use Docker to deploy language translation models for NLP tasks.

item.title: Mastering multi-platform builds, testing, and more with Docker Buildx Bake
item.description: Learn to automate Docker builds and testing with declarative configurations using Buildx Bake.

item.title: Mocking API services in development and testing with WireMock
item.description: Mocking API services in development and testing with WireMock

item.title: Build a named entity recognition app
item.description: This guide explains how to containerize named entity recognition (NER) models using Docker.

item.title: Pre-seeding database with schema and data at startup for development environment
item.description: Pre-seeding database with schema and data at startup for development environment

item.title: Build a sentiment analysis app
item.description: This guide demonstrates how to containerize sentiment analysis models using Docker.

item.title: Build a text recognition app
item.description: This guide details how to containerize text classification models using Docker.

item.title: Build a text summarization app
item.description: This guide shows how to containerize text summarization models with Docker.

item.title: Use containerized databases
item.description: Learn how to effectively run and manage databases as containers.

item.title: Using Docker with Zscaler
item.description: This guide explains how to embed Zscalerâ€™s root certificate into Docker images, allowing containers to operate securely with Zscaler proxies and avoid SSL errors.

item.title: GenAI video transcription and chat
item.description: Learn how to build and deploy a generative AI video analysis and transcription bot using Docker.
